Please type the verification code sent to +88 Hello blank fragment The career summary section is an optional customized section of a resume that lists key achievements, skills, and experience relevant to the position for which you are applying.The career summary section of your resume focuses on your relevant experience and lets the prospective employer know that you have taken the time to create a resume that shows how you are qualified for the job. Special Qualifications (Replacing the Objective) is 3-5 concise sentences on a resume. It is a summary of your most pertinent experience and qualifications that is customized for the position in which you are applying. This is also a place where attributes, such as punctuality and honesty, can be conveyed that would otherwise not be appropriate under work experience. Use the job description to help identify the areas of expertise, distinction, traits and related experiences you have without using the words CV UPLOAD Username can not be empty! Company Name * Company Business * Company Location Designation * Department Responsibilities Currently working \u0020Area of Experiences * Max 3 working disciplines Extracurricular Activities Skill Description Add Your skills Language Name * Name * Organization Name * Designation * Address Phone (Office) Phone (Residential) Email Address Mobile No Relation * First Name * Last Name Gender * Reading * Relation* Relative Writing * Speaking * High Relative Medium Low Other Professional Family Friend Academic Mobile Number * Email Address * Email Address Username Password Retype Password Father\'s Name Mother\'s Name Date of Birth * Marital Status * Nationality * National Id No Religion Present Address * Present Address Permanent Address Current Location * Mobile No 2 Mobile No 1 Alternate Email Objective * ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789 $#@!&*^%`~ ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz .\'- ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789 ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz Objective Present Salary (Tk / Month) Present Salary Expected Salary (Tk / Month) Expected Salary Looking for Available for When writing a resume, some job seekers choose to state an objective on their resume, rather than including it in the body of their cover letter. Stating an objective can convince employers that you know what you want to do and are familiar with the field. To secure a position with a well-established organization with a stable environment that will lead to a lasting relationship in the field of HealthCare. To obtain a position that will enable the use of my strong organizational skills, Microsoft expertise, and ability to work well with people. My objective is to deliver my best to satisfy my clients. I am dedicated and hard working. I will be very much active to meet the deadlines of your company. Good Example! What is objective? Bad Example! What is Career? What is Special Qualification? What is Keywords? The career summary section is an optional customized section of a resume that lists key achievements, skills, and experience relevant to the position for which you are applying.
The career summary section of your resume focuses on your relevant experience and lets the prospective employer know that you have taken the time to create a resume that shows how you are qualified for the job. \"Example #1
  • Three years experience working in the_______ (fill in the blank) industry
  • Competent at managing responsibilities in a high-volume atmosphere
  • Skilled at interacting with customers of all socioeconomic backgrounds
  • Hard worker, quick learner, and ability to assume responsibility

Example2

\" "Special Qualifications (Replacing the Objective) is 3-5 concise sentences on a resume. It is a summary of your most pertinent experience and qualifications that is customized for the position in which you are applying. This is also a place where attributes, such as punctuality and honesty, can be conveyed that would otherwise not be appropriate under work experience. Use the job description to help identify the areas of expertise, distinction, traits and related experiences you have without using the words " I worked for many reputed companies and earned enough knowledge in the field of your given post. I think I am the most eligible candidate for your given post. I am very energetic and dedicated to office work. I am regular and know the very basic of your required field. I have 5 years of experience in the field and I think I am the best candidate for your Job post. \"Keywords are specific words or phrases that job seekers use to search for jobs and employers use to find the right candidates. Keywords are used as search criteria in the same way you do research on the Internet. The more keywords you use, the more closely the job will match what you\'re really looking for.Example:
\\n\" + \" MBA, BBA, Photography, Computer Diploma, Visual Basic, Visual C++,
\\n\" + \" Java, HTML, Photo Shop, AIUB, BUET, DU, IBA, NSU etc \" \"Corporate Real Estate Executive (Your Job title):
Increasing Bottom-Line Profitability through Real Estate Strategies
Professional Profile
Accomplished executive with a proven ability to develop and implement real estate strategies that support business and financial objectives. Have led key initiatives that reduced operating budget by $32 million and contributed to 550 percent stock increase. Recognized as an expert in applying financial concepts to asset management decisions.

Employment History (Retired Army Person) What is Career Summary What is Objective? What is Special Qualification What is Keywords Preferred Functional Job Categories Preferred Special Skilled Job Categories Preferred Organization Type Preferred Job Location Inside Bangladesh Outside Bangladesh English Reading Writing Speaking Skills Skill Description Extra Curricular Activities Please type a valid Email Address Language * Example Preferred Functional Job Categories * Preferred Job Location * Inside Bangladesh Add District * Select Districts Anywhere in Bangladesh Add Country/Region Outside Bangladesh Preferred Special Skilled Job Categories Preferred Organization Type Skills maximum 10 Career Objective Career Summary The "Career Summary" is an optional customized section where you can list your key achievements, skills, and relevant experiences to enrich the value of your resume.This section focuses on your relevant experience and lets the employer know that you have taken time to create your resume which shows your qualification as well as activeness. A resume objective is a short summary of your career growth. Objective should be carefully written to fit the job you are applying for. Bad Example I worked for many reputed companies and earned enough knowledge in the field. I think I am the most eligible candidate for relevent job post. Good Example OK Keyword Objective To build a long-term career in [specific industry] with opportunities for career growth. To enhance my educational and professional skills in a stable and dynamic workplace. To solve problems in a creative and effective manner in a challenging position. My objective is to deliver my best to satisfy my clients. I am dedicated and hard working. I will be very much active to meet the deadlines of your company. Career objective is a short summary of your career growth that complements your experience and skills and gives prospective employers a sense of your work-related ambitions. Keywords are specific words or phrases which job seekers use to search jobs and employers use to find the right candidates. Keywords are used as search criteria like the same way you do research on the Internet. The more keywords you use, the more jobs will match closely to your search. Example: MBA, BBA, Photography, Computer Diploma, Visual Basic, Visual C++, Java, HTML, Photo Shop, BUET, DU, IBA, NSU etc. At present I am working as a [ Your Designation] at [XYZ company]. I have done an Internship at Independent Television ltd. and after my graduation, I served as a Probationary English Teacher at Lions School and College, Rangpur. Except that, during my student life I was involved in different programs of Event organizing at my College and University. I worked for many reputed companies and earned enough knowledge in the field. I think I am the most eligible candidate for relevent job post. Special Qualification I have some special qualifications of Web development like Java, C#, Dot net. Besides, I have potential of event organizing and data analysing too. I can work under pressure and I am a quick learner. I am very energetic and dedicated to office work. I am regular and know the very basic of your required field. I have 5 years of experience in the field and I think I am the best candidate for your Job post. In Special Qualification part you can add the summary of your most pertinent qualifications. This will help to get a job by grabbing attention of the employer. It is also a place where attributes, such as punctuality and honesty can be added too. Make your statement precise and concise to increase the chance of getting job easily. To obtain the job of Marketing Manager with XXX Inc. Coming with three years marketing experience at a college, strong proficiency with various social media platforms and experience with visual designing to help in increasing profitability. Job Application Guideline General Interview Invitation Video Interview Live Interview CV Viewed Message Matched Job SMS Alert Notifications Employability Certification 01844519336 or 16479 BDT 550/- Free for first time Certification Home Do\'s Make sure you have a good internet connection. If the test gets interrupted, just resume test within 4 hours. Follow the clock displays the remaining duration and try to complete your test. Dont\'s Do not use the back button and avoid using scroll button on your mouse during the test. Do not try to modify your answers. Do not try browser usage, screen capturing, photographs, audio, video etc. Avoid trying to record, copy, publish or share any part of the test questions or consult any third person. Successful Test Date Test Time Certification Test requires a laptop or desktop with a webcam and good internet. Now you can Take Test from Home only Tk 300!!\n\nPay 500 Tk to attend test at center. (Test fee 300 Tk + center cost 200 Tk) A laptop/desktop with a webcam is required Viewed by Employer, %1$s If you are Not interested to submit Video Interview, then the employer will be informed that you are not interested to submit it and they will not see your recorded video(s). Also you will not be able to attend Video Interview for this job anymore. Do you still want to continue? Submit(All videos) Instruction: By clicking \"Let\'s Start Now\" you can view the question(s) and record answer(s). You will get 1 hour to submit all the answer(s) after starting recording. If you checked \"Not interested to submit\" Video Interview, then you will not able to record answer(s) for this invitation anymore. If you checked \"Not interested to submit\" Video Interview, then you will not able to attend Video Interview for this job anymore.
